name: Scott Schilling
what_you_do: International speaker, sales trainer, executive coach, and best-selling author delivering coaching, training, and speaking to empower individuals and businesses to achieve their fullest potential.
who_you_serve: Corporations, business owners, entrepreneurs, and individuals seeking growth in awareness, sales skills, and mindset.
social_proof: Over 3,000 live events presented, shared stages with General Colin Powell, Suze Orman, Jack Canfield, and Les Brown, sold millions of dollars in products from the stage, positively impacted hundreds of thousands of individuals worldwide, best-selling author, over 40 years of experience.
business_focus: Empowering individuals and organizations through speaking, sales training, executive coaching, and authorship to achieve growth and success.
service_provided: International speaking, sales training, executive coaching, best-selling author, media hosting, sales advocacy
